sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
scared of someone or something
, se nečesa ali nekoga boji.

seg.quote: She was too shocked and scared to move.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
scared that something unpleasant might happen
, je nervozen in zaskrbljen, ker misli, da se lahko zgodi nekaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: I'm scared that these will turn out to be the wrong ones.
They're scared of making a fool of themselves.
